name: Spinning Swords
description:
Left and Right arrow keys to control your character.  X to change the size of your sword.

Fight the slimes that have swallowed many of your fellow weapons, but be careful not to be engulfed yourself. If the slime touches the hilt of your sword you will take damage.

Your character changes size, and the enemies have slightly different behavior based on their size as well.

All assets were made solo by me in 3 days except for the splat sound from ZapSplat.
